questions.title: Question 1: What is a primary benefit of using robots in manufacturing?
questions.explanation: Using robots in manufacturing enhances safety and precision, leading to more efficient and accurate production processes.

questions.title: Question 2: Which type of robot is commonly used for welding in manufacturing?
questions.explanation: Industrial robots are commonly used for welding and other repetitive tasks in manufacturing due to their precision and reliability.

questions.title: Question 3: What is a challenge of integrating robotics into manufacturing?
options: c. High initial investment and technical complexity
questions.explanation: Integrating robotics into manufacturing involves high initial investment and technical complexity, requiring specialized knowledge and skills.

questions.title: Question 4: How do robots enhance healthcare?
options: a. By replacing all human healthcare workers
b. By providing high precision in surgeries and assisting in patient care
d. By reducing the need for medical education
questions.explanation: Robots enhance healthcare by providing high precision in surgeries, assisting in patient care, and supporting healthcare professionals.

questions.title: Question 5: What is a common application of robots in surgery?
questions.explanation: Robots are commonly used in minimally invasive procedures, providing high precision and reducing patient recovery times.

questions.title: Question 6: Which type of robot assists patients in rehabilitation?
questions.explanation: Exoskeleton robots assist patients in rehabilitation by providing support and aiding in the recovery of mobility and strength.

questions.title: Question 7: What is the role of robots in agriculture?
options: b. Monitoring crops and automating tasks like planting and harvesting
questions.explanation: Robots in agriculture monitor crops and automate tasks such as planting and harvesting, improving efficiency and reducing the need for manual labor.

questions.title: Question 8: Which type of robot is used for precise weeding in agriculture?
questions.explanation: Weeding robots are used in agriculture to precisely identify and remove weeds, reducing the need for chemical herbicides.

questions.title: Question 9: How do drones assist in agriculture?
options: b. By monitoring crop health and soil conditions from the air
questions.explanation: Drones assist in agriculture by providing aerial monitoring of crop health and soil conditions, helping farmers make informed decisions.

questions.title: Question 10: What is a primary benefit of using robots in service and retail?
options: b. Enhanced customer experience and operational efficiency
questions.explanation: Using robots in service and retail enhances customer experience and operational efficiency, leading to better service and lower costs.

questions.title: Question 11: Which type of robot is commonly used for inventory management in retail?
questions.explanation: Inventory management robots are used in retail to assist with tasks such as shelf scanning, stock management, and order fulfillment.

questions.title: Question 12: How do cleaning robots contribute to hygiene and safety?
options: b. By performing cleaning tasks in various environments
questions.explanation: Cleaning robots perform cleaning tasks in various environments, helping maintain high standards of hygiene and safety, particularly in public spaces.
